summary: This changes the staff of magnus to have unlimited charges. Also optional files with various damages. DOES NOT CHANGE STAFF TO ABSORB!
descriptionHtml:
The staff of magnus... Was... weak. But this mod makes the staff usable forever! And optional files where the staff has diferent damage outputs and weight!

ALL FILES HAVE UNLIMITED CHARGE

*If you want a specific Stat setup for the staff, Damage/Weight mod that i dont have up. Feel free to PM me. These take litiraly 10 seconds to make. (Maybe more, takes about 20 seconds for creation kit to start...)
*meaningless 1st star again
**I will not change the staff to absorb. I have changed th etext ingame to show this!
***Future Update: Might make the staff do a set amount of damage even when draining magicka
****Yes im just trying to cover the page with *\'s now...
*****dont judge me!
******6 stars bwahaha
*******You may edit this all you want.
********No there is not readme.txt
*********Will conflict with any mod which changes the staff of magnus\'s stats
**********Will not conflict with mods that change the staff of magnus\'s texture
***********Highly reccomended texture http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4679
************Thats alot of stars.
*************Ill add 5 more rows of stars every update for no real reason.
**************Change whatever you want! Its a simple mod just a few number changes
***************Anyone can make it (im serious. My dog made this for me O_o)
****************That is a serious comment O_O
*****************Did u seriously read all the way down here?
******************Yeesh your dedicated...
*******************Uhm yea there is ABSOLUTLY nothing relivent here
********************Just me not nowing how too spell
*********************Hmm I wonder what to do now
**********************ZOMG Hit download then go play skyrim!
***********************Stop reading your wasting your life
************************Maybe i should make loading screens with these random coments
*************************You think so?
**************************If you read this far your gonna endorse me.
***************************Right?
****************************RIGHT?
*****************************RIGHT!?!?!?!?
******************************Your not are u...
*******************************Insert sad face here
********************************mkay mkay I see you want something relivent
*********************************Calculators are fun!
**********************************Thats all i got take it or leave it
***********************************Shout out to shintei who was the first person to read every star!
************************************Hurray
*************************************Can you dig it?
**************************************I said CAN.YOU.DIG.IT
***************************************ANSWER ME WHEN I THROW STARS ACROSS YOUR SCREEN
****************************************Oh you wanna play that game
*****************************************ill keep u busy now
******************************************Read Below and do what it says
*******************************************Read Bellow and do what it says
********************************************Read Above and do what it says
*********************************************Read Above and do what it says
**********************************************HOW IS IT POSSIBLE YOU ARE READING HERE
***********************************************You dont deserve my stars so i take them all away
How do u like THAT
Huh?
U like it >_<
************************************************Fine you win
*************************************************Ill keep going
**************************************************IM BI-WINNING
***************************************************I got tiger blood and adonis DNA
****************************************************I AM CHARLIE SHEENS YOUNGER BROTHER!
*****************************************************Wait u thought i was a girl?
******************************************************I sound like a girl?
*******************************************************Just cuz i have a hi voice doesnt make me a girl.
********************************************************Ok do we really have to chnck on this
********************************************************* /emote look_Down uhm maybe we shouldn check
**********************************************************Yea fine.... WHATEVER
***********************************************************Every star u read i gain 3% of your soul
************************************************************Cept i gain 3% of the 97% so i get less...
*************************************************************And you will never run out because
**************************************************************Sheogroth wants you to be alive forevah!
****************************************************************Nod at the bird
*****************************************************************And People
******************************************************************Die
*******************************************************************Everywhere People
********************************************************************Die!
author: BrokenMirror
